channel.title: Resources on What, Why, How
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on What, Why, How

item.title: English
item.description: 发音的本质是通过感官（耳朵+眼睛），协助嘴（口腔肌肉），养成正确的发音习惯。 眼（观察口型）+ 耳朵（辩音）+ 嘴（刻意练习）= 漂亮的音 Master spoken english: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ilrPvgs29v0&list=PL9YsEhi5oFAbjsAqP-3b-fAIip98pAsx9&index=3

item.title: Programming language
item.description: Java https://programmingbydoing.com/ java-a-beginners-guide-eighth-edition: https://pdfroom.com/books/java-a-beginners-guide-eighth-edition/PXn2GJrKgxV Python https://realpython.com/ https://au1lib.org/book/5973705/f707f1?id=5973705&secret=f707f1 books for download free books :https://github.com/pamoroso/free-python-books PHP Javascript Javascript https://masteringjs.io/fundamentals

item.title: Software Architecture
item.description: Software architecture patterns search #softwarearchitecture on youtube c4 Model https://c4model.com/ DDD https://github.com/heynickc/awesome-ddd example about hexagonal architecture. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ujb_O6myknY https://github.com/tedyoung/kid-bank https://www.twitch.tv/videos/663668992 related to hexagonal architecture: https://www.jianshu.com/p/c2a361c2406c architecture decision record: https://adr.github.io/ archunit is a java tool to help enforcing architecture, for php there is one as well https://github.com/j6s/phparch 凤凰架构-构筑可靠的大型分布式系统 System Design https://www.stephanboyer.com/post/132/what-are-covariance-and-contravariance https://www.cloudsavvyit.com/9904/what-is-covariance-and-contravariance-in-programming/ AWS https://app.cloudcraft.co/blueprint/23df5228-15cf-4521-bf0b-5e9da066c29c Draw AWS

item.title: Web development
item.description: HTML HTML head element explaination https://github.com/joshbuchea/HEAD Every element I use for the basic structure of a HTML document https://www.matuzo.at/blog/html-boilerplate/ CSS Google learn css course: https://web.dev/learn/css/ Icon icon free download: https://iconic.app/
